channel.title: Question on using clients
channel.description:
I'm having trouble with using clients and things. When I download a client for a specific server, I don't know how to use it. After downloading, i click the server icon but a window opens saying:
"Windows can not open this file"... "To open this file, Windows need to know what program created it".
Am I suppose to click on the icon? Or do I open moparscape and somehow blend the client with the server? I'm terribly confused, and need some help. Oh and I have downloaded moparscape, don't know if this would help though.
And what is ayran? I thought you just download the moparscape server and play.

item.title: Question on using clients
item.dc:creator: @grapejuice grapejuice
item.description:
@grapejuice wrote:

I’m having trouble with using clients and things. When I download a client for a specific server, I don’t know how to use it. After downloading, i click the server icon but a window opens saying:

“Windows can not open this file”… “To open this file, Windows need to know what program created it”.

Am I suppose to click on the icon? Or do I open moparscape and somehow blend the client with the server? I’m terribly confused, and need some help. Oh and I have downloaded moparscape, don’t know if this would help though.

And what is ayran? I thought you just download the moparscape server and play.
